days_since_release: it's been {{number_of_days}} days since this video was released
header_des: Swipe right to like, swipe left to pass. If they like you back, it’s a match!
about_des: Whatever you are looking for, we give you the chance to find it. But we also believe that technology could never replace the chemistry between two people. You'll only know whether someone is right for you by taking that chance.
features_h3_1: Say goodbye to wondering if they look like their profile pictures
features_des_1: Not to mention, the most convenient and cost effective. Once you match, no need to swap phone numbers, just use our video calling to talk to each other.
features_h3_2: Group video chat: The safest way to meet in today’s world...
features_des_2: More people, more fun! Let's have an online party with your new friends right in the comfort of your house. Without worries about traffic or safety, you can pour yourself a drink, toast and talk!
features_h3_3: Finding someone who looks like your dream crush has never been easier!
features_des_3: Have a crush on a someone? Guess what, you can find them in real life! Just upload the image you like and your crush-lookalike will show up. Now it's up to you to make the move!
download_des: Start meeting new people in your area!
meta_des: iMatch - Match, Chat, Date 12+, Find your real love, MDC MEDIA CO.,LTD, Designed for iPhone.iMatch is a dating application which help you get a new friends easier than ever.We use a sophisticated AI system
